title: Seven Deathly Soles
description: You've always been warned about walking a mile in someone's shoes but no one told you that it could be such a deadly journey. 7DS Books brings you another themed collection of short stories with the highest quality indie authors for you to discover. Within these pages you will find multi-genre tales that may pump you up or leave you shaking in your boots; each story unique and twisted, only connected on the common theme of shoes & death.
author: Dawn Kirby
